Desc.entry: Facilities include 3 floodlit all weather courts. All levels of players welcome from beginners to league players. Group and individual coaching available for adults and juniors throughout the season. Men's and mixed teams play in the Sheffield and District Leagues. Runs a short indoor tennis course for children aged 5-6 years and a social tennis night on Mondays and Thursdays. Holds annual club knockout tournaments. A registered charity.
